TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrayExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现对 .NET Framework XAML 服务的 支持

span.span: Implements support for .NET Framework XAML Services

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为实现的类`x:Array`标记扩展行为和`x:ArrayExtension`从 [MS-XAML] 的信息项。 is the class that implements the `x:Array` markup extension behavior, and the `x:ArrayExtension` information item from [MS-XAML]. `x:Array` 支持允许添加数组，通过特定标记启用扩展语法中的任意子元素的 XAML 语言功能。`x:Array` supports a XAML language feature that allows adding arbitrary child elements within an array, through a particular markup extension enabled syntax. 标记扩展语法需要显式属性标记扩展用法和用于指定内容语法。The markup extension syntax requires an explicit attribute on the markup extension usage, and a content syntax for specifying the . 有关详细信息和语法的详细信息，请参阅[X:array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)。For more information and details on the syntax, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md). 此类是标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 标记扩展类存在主要是为了提供对 XAML 处理器实现中，某个方面的基础结构支持，公开由标记扩展类的成员不会从用户代码通常调用。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of a XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension class are not typically called from user code. 此扩展插件支持[X:array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)从 XAML 的.NET Framework XAML 服务实现的 XAML 和其 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的使用情况。This extension supports the [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md) usage from XAML for .NET Framework XAML Services implementation of XAML and its XAML readers and XAML writers. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 PresentationFramework.dll 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationFramework.dll. 从.NET Framework 4，开始位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。Starting with the .NET Framework 4, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 这使得`x:Array`用法可供框架或在.NET Framework XAML 服务生成如 Windows Workflow Foundation 的技术。This makes the `x:Array` usage available to frameworks or technologies such as Windows Workflow Foundation that are built on .NET Framework XAML Services. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). System.Xaml 程序集使用从类型映射在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间的程序集中的 CLR 命名空间 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)])。The System.Xaml assembly uses to map types from the CLR namespace in the assembly to the XAML namespace for the XAML language ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]). 在典型的 XAML 标记中声明的前缀[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]中根元素映射并使用前缀`x`。In typical XAML markup, you declare a prefix for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] in a root element mapping and use the prefix `x`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法并不用于直接调用，并且不参与的任何现有.NET 解释`x:Array`标记扩展行为。This method is not intended to be called directly, and does not participate in any existing .NET interpretation of the `x:Array` markup extension behavior. 与数组 Api 或语言功能应进行任何代码访问后备数组实例。Any code access to the backing array instance should be done with array APIs or language features. 任何其他 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器实现应改为使用.NET System.Xaml 服务扩展如以确定哪种方法调用，或以及适当的接口强制转换。Any alternative XAML reader or XAML writer implementations should instead use the .NET System.Xaml service extensions such as to determine what method to call, or together with appropriate interface casting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法并不用于直接调用，并且不参与解释`x:Array`标记扩展行为。This method is not intended to be called directly, and does not participate in interpretation of the `x:Array` markup extension behavior.

The array contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的特性化的 XAML 内容属性。 is the attributed XAML content property of . XAML 内容属性标记支持作为子对象在 XAML 中的元素中指定的数组项元素的典型 XAML 用法。XAML content property designation supports the typical XAML usage of specifying the item elements of an array as child object elements in XAML. 是对象模型和标记扩展实现公开有关内部函数`ArrayExtension.Items`属性，如为定义`x:ArrayExtension`[MS-XAML] 中。 is the object model and markup extension implementation exposure for the intrinsic `ArrayExtension.Items` property, as defined for `x:ArrayExtension` in [MS-XAML]. 键入之间的不匹配和中的项，或任何其他验证问题，不会报告作为异常之前调用。Type mismatches between and the items in , or any other validation issues, are not reported as exceptions until is invoked. 此行为是与 XAML 标记扩展的常规设计原则一致。This behavior is consistent with the general design principles of XAML markup extensions. 有关 XAML 用法的信息，请参阅[X:array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 返回一个数组，其大小为 值中提供的对象数。

span.span: Returns an array that is sized to the number of objects supplied in the values.
The created array, or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持标记扩展行为，不通常由调用用户代码，除非该用户代码实现 XAML 处理行为。This method supports markup extension behavior and is not typically called by user code, unless that user code implements XAML processing behavior. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法进行正确处理`x:Array`对象创建期间的元素。A XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `x:Array` elements during object creation. 这依赖于常规行为 XAML 处理器在处理任何并调用其`ProvideValue`实现。This relies on general behavior for XAML processors when they process any and call its `ProvideValue` implementation. 此实现不依赖于基于传递的任何服务`serviceProvider`。This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 但是，它未依赖于 CLR 概念传输的默认 XAML 架构上下文与为.NET Framework XAML 服务的处理时的扩展的使用。However, it does rely on CLR concepts as transmitted by the extension's use while processing with the default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services. 有关标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅[的标记扩展 XAML 概述](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information on markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md).
